Message: I dont feel like training today, I am sorry.

It's alright to have off days, but remember, every effort brings you closer to your goals. Take a breather now, and we can pick up where we left off tomorrow with renewed energy. I'll be here for you when the time comes.
I am so busy today, I dont have any time today and I have not eaten breakfast yet.

Your well-being matters too. Perhaps pushing physical training to later in the day or rescheduling might help. Don't forget to take care of essential needs first. We'll adapt to make sure you don't compromise self-care. Let's find a more suitable moment to focus on your progress
I lost my training shoes yesterday and all clothing stores are closed today, so I cant buy new ones.

Setbacks happen, but don't let them discourage you. We'll work together to find alternatives or a temporary solution. In the meantime, focusing on proper stretching or bodyweight exercises could keep up your routine until new gear arrives. Remember, the journey may have twists, but the destination remains the
